sentences.en: His features were pretty yet, and his eye and complexion brighter than I remembered them, though with merely temporary lustre borrowed from the salubrious air and genial sun.
sentences.cn: 他的相貌挺好看，眼睛和气色也比我所记得的有精神些，虽然那仅仅是从有益健康的空气与和煦的阳光中借来的暂时的光辉。

sentences.en: Other employers have resorted to less salubrious solutions.
sentences.cn: 另一些雇主所提供的住宿条件就没那么好了.

sentences.en: Paper victories aside, the salubrious effect on humans was also recognized early on.
sentences.cn: 除了在纸张上的胜利, 对人的健康效果也很早被认识到.

sentences.en: the less salubrious area near the docks
sentences.cn: 码头附近环境较差的地区

sentences.en: The lines between salubrious and unwholesome government information are not easy to draw.
sentences.cn: 有益和有害的政府信息之间的界线并不那么容易划分。

sentences.en: The surroundings were not very salubrious.

words.tran_cn: 有益的，有用的；有益健康的
清爽的；气候有益健康的
